verbose_text: The fact that Amlx, an inhibitor of TBK1 that blocks mitophagic flux by reducing Optn and p62 / SQSTM1 activities, reduces lysosome size suggests that Amlx may be a potential drug to regulate excess mitophagic flux and maintain lysosomal function under hyperglycemic redox stress.
evidence: TBK1                            that blocks mitophagic flux by reducing Optn and p62/SQSTM1
